text: Morning Edition is an American radio news program. It is produced and distributed by NPR. It airs weekday mornings and runs for two hours, and many stations repeat one or both hours. The show feeds live from 5:00 to 9:00 AM ET, with feeds and updates as required until noon. It premiered on November 5, 1979. ==References== Category:Media in the United States Category:Radio Category:1979 establishments in the United States
title: Morning Edition
